Jaume.Coord

    Calin  
    Jaume

    • Uses of Coord in Jaume

      Methods in Jaume that return Coord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coord Coord.add(Coord position)
      This function is used to add the coordinates of this Coord to the position parameter
      Coord Piece.getPosition()
      This function gets the position of the Piece on the board
      Methods in Jaume that return types with arguments of type Coord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Piece.getLegalMoves(Board board)
      This function is used as a filter for getPossibleMoves, because it is needed to know if the player is in check and has to defend the King or not
      java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Pawn.getPossibleMoves(Board board)
      The possible moves from a Pawn are the one step forward moves, the two step forward moves if the Pawn is at it's original position, ore one step diagonally forward to attack an enemy Piece.
      abstract java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Piece.getPossibleMoves(Board board)
      This function has been made to know which moves can a specific Piece in a specific Coord can do
      java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Rook.getPossibleMoves(Board board)
      The possible moves from a Rook are the straight moves.
      java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Queen.getPossibleMoves(Board board)
      The possible moves from a Queen are the diagonal moves and the straight moves.
      java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Bishop.getPossibleMoves(Board board)
      The possible moves from a Bishop are the diagonal moves.
      java.util.ArrayList<Coord> King.getPossibleMoves(Board board)
      The possible moves from a King are the 1 step moves.
      java.util.ArrayList<Coord> Knight.getPossibleMoves(Board board)
      The possible moves from a Knight are the moves that draw an L.
      Methods in Jaume with parameters of type Coord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coord Coord.add(Coord position)
      This function is used to add the coordinates of this Coord to the position parameter
      Piece Board.getPieceInCoord(Coord position)
      It gives the piece which is located in a certain position
      static boolean Board.inBounds(Coord position)
      It says if a position is in bounds of the Board
      void Board.movePiece(Piece piece, Coord finalPos)
      This function is used to move a Piece to another position of the board
      void Piece.setPosition(Coord position)
      Used to set a given position to the Piece
